description:
As day turns to night, this compact rear light helps keep you seen. The KTV Drive rear light sets you up for low-light commutes, featuring 2 LEDs set into an engineered reflector to maximize your visibility. Charging is a breeze with the integrated plug – just pop off the rear cover and connect your light directly to any standard USB port, eliminating the need for a cable.

  • 5 lighting modes, 2 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 10 lumens (4.5h), 3 lumens (12.5h), flash 1–10 lumens (12.5h), flash 2–5 lumens (20h) and pulse–10 lumens (7h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of each light’s 2 LEDs to maximize visibility
  • Integrated USB plug means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps. Front light also has an integrated clip to mount it to a pack or a dog collar
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne KTV Drive Rear Light
